title: Cord's Redemption
description: Everyone wants what they can’t have.Wade and his billionaire family wants more of my family’s land.I want his woman.To be fair, she was mine first. When we were younger, Josie Porter was my world.Young love ended with real heartache.Now she’s at my door, begging me to save her from Wade.There’s one big problem.She’s wearing an engagement ring.If I touch her, I feel whole.If I make her mine, everything I’ve worked for is gone.My love will cause a war that my family is not prepared to fight or win.And this is all before I wake up one day to find a baby in a car seat at my door. With a note telling me I’m the baby’s father.Welcome to the Lawless Lynots.
author: Jaxson Kidman
